title: About
text:
About this site
My name is Luis Cerrillos, I was born and raised in Pomona, CA. I spent a lot of my youth in the garage working on classic cars and dirt bikes. I found a deep passion for all things mechanics. I currently am finishing up my Marine Science degree at California State University of Monterey Bay. I currently am working on a project utilizing SCUBA and stereo-video to study the latitudinal changes of fish species richness/composition/density/etc.

title: Luis Cerrillos
text: Luis Cerrillos is an Undergrad Student, Research Diver, and Anthropocene Scholar for the Marine Science Department at [California State University, Monterey Bay] (https://csumb.edu/marinescience/).
